verses.content: Aw LALPA chawimawiin hla thar sak unla, Thil maktakhai a thaw ta sih a; A kut changtieng le a bân inthieng chun ama ta dingin sandamna a siempêk tah a.
LALPA chun a sandamna chu ân hriettir a, A felna chu hnam tin mithmua chun chiengtakin ân langtir tah.
Israel sûnghai chunga a ngilnei- zie le, a ringumzie chu a hriet zing a, Kâwlkawdawnga mi po po khawmin ei Pathien sandamna chu an hmu tah.
Leihnuoia um po pohai, LALPA chawimawiin hlimtakin khêk unla, Khêk suok unla, hlimin hla sak ro; anih, inpâkna hla sak ro.
Ṭingṭang leh LALPA inpâkin hla sak ro, Ṭingṭang le inpâkna hla ri leh.
Tawtawrâwthai le tawtawrâwt bi nei ri leh, Laltak, LALPA hmaa chun hlimtakin khêk ro.
Tuisuoriet le a sûnga um po po hi inri hum hum raw se, Khawvêl le a sûnga chênghai le hin.
Tuilienhai chun an kut ben sienla, Tlânghai chu hlimin LALPA hmaa chun hla sak tâwl rawhai se.
Hnuoi ro rêl dingin a hung ding a ni sih a, Khawvêl hi feltakin ro rêlpêk a ta; Thlierbîk nei loin mi tin ro chu rêl a tih.
